name: Partition
description:
Reorders the elements in the range [first, last) in such a way that all elements for which the predicate p returns true precede
all elements for which predicate p returns false.
steps:
Let K be the first index whose element does not match a given predicate. If K does not exist, then the entire input is 
already partitioned and we can short-circuit.
For each index I > K: if input[I] matches predicate: swap input[K] and input[I], and increment K
